column7: #Since the amb zones are in prefabs, now we would have to trigger ext2 amb in script. If we need a differnt mix in ext1 and ext2 we would need to trigger scenemix in script for both areas and mix ext1 & 2 will have to be almost empty since the amb zones will always set back the exterior" mix."
